SIZE

[acss-full-size]

MATCH PARENT

[acss-full-width]

NORMAL INLINE-BLOCK INLINE-BLOCK MATCH PARENT WIDTH

[acss-full-height]

INLINE-BLOCK MATCH PARENT HEIGHT

[acss-full-min-size]

MATCH PARENT SIZE
THE ELEMENT'S TEXT WILL OVERFLOW THE CONTAINER IF THE TEXT IS SMALLER THEN TEXT AREA SIZE

[acss-full-min-width]

MATCH PARENT SIZE
THE ELEMENT'S TEXT WILL OVERFLOW THE CONTAINER IF THE TEXT IS SMALLER THEN TEXT AREA SIZE

[acss-full-min-height]

MATCH PARENT SIZE
THE ELEMENT'S TEXT WILL OVERFLOW THE CONTAINER IF THE TEXT IS SMALLER THEN TEXT AREA SIZE

[acss-full-max-size]

MATCH PARENT SIZE
THE ELEMENT'S TEXT WILL OVERFLOW THE CONTAINER IF THE TEXT IS SMALLER THEN TEXT AREA SIZE

[acss-full-max-width]

MATCH PARENT SIZE
THE ELEMENT'S TEXT WILL OVERFLOW THE CONTAINER IF THE TEXT IS SMALLER THEN TEXT AREA SIZE

[acss-full-max-height]

MATCH PARENT SIZE
THE ELEMENT'S TEXT WILL OVERFLOW THE CONTAINER IF THE TEXT IS SMALLER THEN TEXT AREA SIZE
